references.reason: This review paper provides a comprehensive overview of the field of non-line-of-sight (NLOS) imaging, establishing the broader context for the current work.

references.paper_title: Confocal non-line-of-sight imaging based on the light-cone transform
references.reason: This paper introduces the light-cone transform (LCT), a fundamental technique used in many NLOS imaging methods, including the method presented in this paper.

references.paper_title: Wave-based non-line-of-sight imaging using fast fk migration
references.reason: This paper presents the fast FK migration method, another important technique for NLOS imaging that improves computational efficiency.

references.paper_title: Non-line-of-sight imaging with arbitrary illumination and detection pattern
references.reason: This paper addresses the challenge of NLOS imaging from irregularly undersampled transients, a problem directly addressed by the current work.

references.paper_title: Learned feature embeddings for non-line-of-sight imaging and recognition
references.reason: This paper introduces a learning-based approach for NLOS imaging, which is relevant to the unsupervised learning method proposed in the current work.
